snippet: David Rockwell talks about how travel played a role in designing exhibition spaces for a civil rights center that opens to the public in Atlanta later this month.
abstract: Travel Q&A with David Rockwell, president of Rockwell group, which designed exhibition spaces for Atlanta's National Center for Civil and Human Rights; edited excerpts from interview with Rockwell provide a glimpse into his inspiration for making the center come alive.
lead_paragraph: David Rockwell talks about how travel played a role in designing exhibition spaces for a civil rights center that opens to the public in Atlanta later this month.

headline.main: Finding Inspiration for a Civil Rights Museum
headline.print_headline: David Rockwell on Designing a Civil Rights Spotlight.

keywords.value: Center for Civil and Human Rights (Atlanta, Ga)
keywords.name: organizations
